text: Scottish English, also known as Scottish Standard English or Standard Scottish English (SSE), is a dialect of English that is spoken in Scotland. People can tell Scottish English from other types of British English by the accents, grammar and vocabulary. Scottish English should not be confused with Scots, a language that is very much like English. == Examples == You can't understand what Scottish English is without a few examples. Can ye now? == Alternative Words Used in Scottish English == In Scottish English words are the same as English however there's differences. These are a few of the different words use in Scottish English. Category:Scotland Category:British English Category:Language articles without language codes
title: Scottish English
